articles.title: Charlie Kirk shot and killed at Utah event; manhunt for shooter ongoing
articles.description: Conservative activist and Turning Point USA co-founder Charlie Kirk died Wednesday after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University. A manhunt for the shooter is underway.

articles.title: NATO scrambles jets to shoot down Russian drones in Poland, raising fears of war spillover
articles.description: Poland scrambled fighter jets after Russian drones entered its airspace during an attack on Ukraine. NATO is closely monitoring the situation, with fears of the conflict spilling over into member states.

articles.title: Qatar's role as mediator between Israel and Hamas faces new challenges following attack in Doha
articles.description: An Israeli strike in Doha, Qatar, aimed at Hamas leaders, has created new challenges for Qatar's role as a mediator in the conflict between Israel and Hamas. Qatari officials have stated that the strike killed any hope of hostage release.
